page.title: 04Newbridge High School
page.content: For many years{Newbridge High {School}was looked on as a landmark by many people. It was built in 1909 and was first called King Edward V11 grammar school. In March 1984 the school was badly damaged in an arson attack. The front of the main building was distroyed, the balcony went up in flames and the roof caved in. Much of the equipment and pictures were destroyed and the whole structure weakened. As a result of the fire, part of the playing field has been turned into a site for mobile classrooms. Teachers and volunteers helped to clear the debris, seeing what could be saved. The builders have just started to rebuild the end gables of the building.
